sqls.description: 存入支取时用到的命名SQL

select.longname: 查询存入计划表中状态为未处理或正在处理中的最小序号
select.sql: select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 根据当前日期查询存入计划漏存金额
select.sql: select sum(plmony - resvam) as svbktm from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select sum(plmony - resvam) as svbktm from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select sum(plmony - resvam) as svbktm from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 根据当前日期查询存入计划漏存的最小序号
select.sql: select min(seqnum) as mnsqno from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) as mnsqno from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) as mnsqno from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 根据当前日期查询存入计划漏存的最大序号
select.sql: select max(seqnum) as mxsqno from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select max(seqnum) as mxsqno from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select max(seqnum) as mxsqno from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and ploved <= #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 查询活期支取计划表中状态为未处理或正在处理中的最小序号
select.sql: select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_draw_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_draw_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_draw_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 查询活期支取计划表中状态为处理完成或正在处理中的最大序号
select.sql: select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_draw_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('1','2')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_draw_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('1','2')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_draw_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('1','2')

select.longname: 查询定期支取计划表中状态为未处理或正在处理中的最小序号
select.sql: select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxdr_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxdr_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxdr_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 查询定期支取计划表中状态为处理完成或正在处理中的最大序号
select.sql: select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxdr_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('1','2')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxdr_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('1','2')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxdr_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('1','2')

select.longname: 获取活期支取计划违约记录数
select.sql: select count(*) as count from kna_draw_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_draw_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_draw_plan where dpbkfg ='1'

select.longname: 获取定期支取计划违约记录数
select.sql: select count(*) as count from kna_fxdr_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_fxdr_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_fxdr_plan where dpbkfg ='1'

select.longname: 根据日期查询存入计划当期计划
select.sql: select * from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select * from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select * from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 根据日期查询存入计划当期计划(定期)
select.sql: select * from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select * from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')
select * from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 查询存入计划表中状态为成功或处理中的最大序号
select.sql: select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('2','1')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('2','1')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_save_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('2','1')

select.longname: 查询定期存入计划表中状态成功和处理中的最大序号
select.sql: select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('2','1')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('2','1')
select max(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('2','1')

select.longname: 获取活期存入计划违约记录数
select.sql: select count(*) as count from kna_save_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_save_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_save_plan where dpbkfg ='1'

select.longname: 获取定期存入计划违约记录数
select.sql: select count(*) as count from kna_fxsv_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_fxsv_plan where dpbkfg ='1'
select count(*) as count from kna_fxsv_plan where dpbkfg ='1'

select.longname: 根据对账日期查询电子账户出入金明细
select.sql: select a.* from knl_iobl a where a.chckdt = #trandt#
select a.* from knl_iobl a where a.chckdt = #trandt#
select a.* from knl_iobl a where a.chckdt = #trandt#

select.longname: 根据日期查询存入计划当期计划(活期+定期)
select.sql: select * from kna_save_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# union select * from kna_fxsv_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt#

select * from kna_save_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# union select * from kna_fxsv_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt#

select * from kna_save_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# union select * from kna_fxsv_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt#

select.longname: 查询存入计划表中状态为未处理或正在处理中的最小序号
select.sql: select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')
select min(seqnum) seqnum from kna_fxsv_plan where corpno = #corpno# and acctno = #acctno# and plstat in ('0','1')

select.longname: 根据日期查询支取计划当期计划
select.sql: select * from kna_draw_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# union select * from kna_fxdr_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt#

select * from kna_draw_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# union select * from kna_fxdr_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt#

select * from kna_draw_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt# union select * from kna_fxdr_plan where plstat in ( '0','1' ) and plstad <= #trandt# and ploved > #trandt#
